document_data.mainbody:
Vance was a toll collector who lived and worked on the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR.
He had fair skin and gray-tan hair he kept cropped short.
Vance died in the , when the cult of the Absolute raided the tollhouse at which he worked. He and his fellow Marten were abandoned by the guards sworn to protect them, but were lost their lives. Vance leapt out of the tollhouses window in an attempt to flee, but did not survive the landing onto the ground below.
